column5: Brief justifications in the reading notes that explain each film’s personal significance to me
This is the movie that introduced me to movies. The first time I realized the importance / breadth of cinema.

A blockbuster with that thrives on spectacle, but is ultimately motivated by humanity. Art cinema on the grandest scale.
It was a recent viewing (sometime late 2019) that I was moved by the story— a story of time, love, and space.
Stalker is an experience. It is full of ideas, yet completely devoid of answers.
I’m a sucker for philosophical science-fiction. Plus, I saw many parallels to myself
